comment._content: Thanks, lifeasdaddy - you found the same place to take the photo!

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content:
The original photograph had sat in my favourites file for a long time.  Firstly because of the beautiful symmetry, and secondly so I could one day take a comparison shot.

Over the past two months I had sat in the reading room a few times, wondering if I would be able to get permission to ascend to a "staff only" platform that sits exactly opposite the clock in the photograph so I could take the comparison shot.  

Then one time I was passing behind the place from where my photograph was taken and discovered there is a locked door to the balcony I wanted to access, but that the door has paynes of glass.  I took this pic through the glass, no special access required.

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: And here is an even earlier reading room: www.flickr.com/photos/statelibraryofnsw/3575553304/
